original_title: 憧れのお天気キャスターを俺の自宅に監禁して毎日キメセク中出ししてやった。
overview: She is Mai Mizuhara, a weathercaster who is rapidly gaining popularity. I happened to see her on TV and fell in love with her. From that day on, all of her programs that she appeared on were taped, and she replayed them over and over again to satisfy her sexual desires. However, I was no longer satisfied with just that. I wanted to touch her in real life... I kidnapped her.
title: I Have My Favorite Weather Girl Here At My Home, In Confinement, So I Can Have Creampie Sex With Her Every Day. Hikari Ninomiya
